archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Establish & Manage Commercial Debt Recovery Arrangement
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish and manage commercial arrangements with third parties for the recovery of aged party debt, and/or selling of parts of the debt portfolio to one or more third parties.

properties.value: Establish & Manage Commercial Debt Recovery Arrangement establishes and manages commercial arrangements with third parties for the recovery of aged party debt, and/or selling of parts of the debt portfolio to third parties. These process interacts with Party Tender Management and/or Party Agreement Management to establish and manage commercial arrangements with one or more third parties.
